TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Examination of the inside of the nose using a rhinoscope. A rhinoscope is a thin, tube-like instrument with a light and a lens for viewing. It may also have a tool to remove tissue to be checked under a microscope for signs of disease. Also called nasoscopy.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Examen del interior de la nariz con un rinoscopio. Un rinoscopio es un instrumento con forma de tubo delgado con una luz y una lente para ver.
